name: Midnight Streamup
description:
Converts Streamup's white design to a dark one that's easier on the eyes. 

The main video player takes up the entire width of the window now, and chat is hidden in the bottom-right corner of the screen, visible when hovering over that portion of the browser window.
additional_info:
TO DO:

2016-03-05
The header is now hidden on video pages. It behaves like chat, becoming visible on hover.

2016-03-05
First Version.
